ID_73.value: Fingrid’s consolidated financial statements have been drawn up in accordance with the International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS).

ID_10.value: Fingrid Oyj is a Finnish public limited liability company responsible for electricity transmission in Finland’s main grid. The nationwide main grid is an integral part of the power system in Finland. The main grid is the trunk network to which major power plants, industrial plants and electricity distribution networks are connected.
